item.title: Covid in Scotland: Denying 12-15s a vaccine is 'unethical', says union
item.description: The EIS teachers' union believes it is a child's right to be offered the same care as the rest of the population.

item.title: Bike crashes through driver's windscreen on M9 at West Lothian

item.title: Pride march returns to Glasgow after Covid pause
item.description: Participants, dressed in bright colours, were asked to take a lateral flow test before the event and wear masks.

item.description: Key maps and charts explaining how the virus has spread around the world.

item.title: Burrell Collection to reopen in March after five years

item.title: 'I'm living my childhood dream as a theme park designer'

item.title: One-in-two-million blue lobster landed by Aberdeen fisherman

item.title: Glasgow Pride Mardi Gla march returns

item.title: Scotland Under-21s: European qualifier in Turkey live on the BBC
